body: The Japan Android Group is hosting the "Android Bazaar and Conference 2011 Winter" at Tokyo University today, and many people are tweeting about it with the hashtag #abc2011w.
original_body: The Japan Android Group is hosting the "Android Bazaar and Conference 2011 Winter" at Tokyo University today, and many people are tweeting about it with the hashtag #abc2011w.
title: Japan: Android Conference
